lead_paragraph: The Justice Department suggested that Otis Byrd’s death in March was a suicide, though it did not specifically say he killed himself.

headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Hanging Death Declared Not a Homicide
headline.main: Mississippi: Hanging Death Declared Not a Homicide

snippet: The Justice Department suggested that Otis Byrd’s death in March was a suicide, though it did not specifically say he killed himself.
abstract: Justice Dept closes case in hanging death of black Mississippi man Otis Byrd, citing insufficient evidence to support categorizing death as homicide; Byrd's relatives reject notion that he killed himself.
